summary: This little mod lets you finally conjure up a sweetroll!
descriptionHtml:
Do you like sweetrolls?
Are you a conjuration mage and don't want to use restoration or alchemy to heal yourself?
Are you tired of not being able to conjure up a sweetroll for the hold guards?

If so this mod is for you!

Location: The tome is located to the left of Dragonreach. While going towards the stairs, instead of going inside walk up the hill to the left and it is sitting on a "warm bed".

Installation: Just drag and drop the esp. into your data folder and make sure the box is checked under data files.

Uninstalling: Make sure the spell is unequipped from your hand before you uninstall! Uncheck the box and then delete the esp. from your data folder.

I will take suggestions and add to the mod. I am thinking for doing a conjure gold coins mod, but I want to make it some what balanced.

New idea thanks to supporter, conjure cabbage! Soon to come in next update!
author: Zman88
